page.title: 16Gt.Waldingfield:Sunday
page.content: I got up at 7:00 and watched The A-Team on video.Then I washed my face, got dressed and went out to the car. Some friends came too.We were going to Great Leighs,near Braintree.We had lunch at the Sportsman pub on the way. I had a beefburger and fries(chipped potatoes).When we got to Great Leighs we watched the racing tractors pull a steel sledge.One tractor was called Nightmare.Next we went to see the Banger Racing.A wheel came off one of them and it nearly hit me.Afterwards we went home and had sandwiches for tea.
